thread.title: CHGT: Customizable Galleries to Give Portal Users Place to Market Their 3D Creations
thread.title_full: CHGT: Customizable Galleries to Give Portal Users Place to Market Their 3D Creations

author: admin
title: CHGT: Customizable Galleries to Give Portal Users Place to Market Their 3D Creations
text:
Changing Technologies, Inc. 
HOUSTON -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Changing Technologies, Inc. (OTCBB: CHGT) is developing an enhancement to its highly successful new 3D printing site, 6d3d.com , that will enable designers and content creators to advertise and market their three-dimensional artwork directly on the CHGT portal. Eventually, this enhancement would grow to include an option to obtain a unique URL that will give users the ability to customize their page with their own specific look and feel. 
“With the added power of this virtual storefront, our portal will continue to solidify itself as the site of choice for users of all skill levels,” said CHGT CEO Marco Valenzuela. “People want a convenient, pain-free way to market and buy 3D products and we expect this feature to drive considerable additional traffic to the portal and revenues to CHGT. The marketplace has spoken and by the number of site visits, uploads and downloads we’ve seen in the weeks since launch, the 6d3D portal has proven quite popular throughout the global 3D printing community.” 
3D printing has been enjoying such explosive growth that market forecasts frequently become outdated as soon as they are published. However, the most recent estimates suggest 3D printing will expand at an impressive 16.8 percent compound annual growth rate through 2019. 
For more information on CHGT, please visit www.changingtechno.com . 
For more information on 6 th Dimension Technologies, visit http://www.6d3d.com . 
About Changing Technologies, Inc. 
Changing Technologies, Inc. (CHGT) is an emerging technology company focused on developing innovative concepts to bring to consumers. It recently created a new subsidiary — 6 th Dimension Technologies — to pursue additional growth areas and market needs in the booming 3D printing sector. A forward-thinking company working to be at the forefront of the next generation of consumer-based technology, CHGT is positioning itself to leverage global demand for the latest technological advances and services the company offers. Changing Technologies, Inc. is in the cutting-edge technology sphere alongside companies like Voxelijet AG ( VJET ), Arcam AB ( AMAVF ), and ExOne Co. ( XONE ).
